productTitle: New Tv Gaming System | Wireless Console Retro Gaming Console |4K Ultra HD |Plug & Play Wireless TV Video Game System | 24,000+ Games | 10 Emulators | Dual-Player Setup | 2.4G Wireless Game Stick

Reviews.reviewDetails: Super excited to have made this purchase. Massive nostalgic value.Joysticks are good quality, takes a bit of time to set up. I had trouble with the set up so I called the vendor and he was very supportive!I loved the overall purchase.

Havenâ€™t seen such cheap quality electronic product ever on Amazon. The console looks and feels like it is made from cheap polythene plastic. And there is no product manual or online support. Only saving grace is that this product is returnable and refundable.
This game is worth buying, my children liked it. I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good games.
Value for money-4/5It is good but the range is short to moderate. Control is good games are nice. But at times the buttons don't respond.
The hardware quality of the product is good, but user interface with software is very baad , game resolution quality is very poor

After connecting it is not working. It is showing blue screen along with no signal. I returned the product and waiting for next lot. As my 6 years old son is very disappointed. Any idea why this has happend?
Packaging is very good product,quality is very good , functionality properly , value for money
